Instance Property# subtitleRendition

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
var subtitleRendition: AVMetricMediaRendition { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/avfoundation/avmetricplayeritemvariantswitchstartevent/subtitlerendition#discussion)

Contains information corresponding to the currently selected subtitle rendition.
